Description: 3 beads and one spacer-bead made of faience A: spacer-bead made of light green glazed faience, three segments preserved, one of them broken off partly B: 3 segmented cylindrical beads, two of them broken into 2 fragments, one of them still shows remains of light green glaze, the other two are white, largest of them measured
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
